    • ConvertRegistersToDouble

      public static double ConvertRegistersToDouble(int[] registers, RegisterOrder registerOrder) throws IllegalArgumentException

      Parameters:
      registers - 16 Bit Registers
      registerOrder - High Register first or low Register first
      Returns:
      64 bit double value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

      Converts 16 - Bit Register values to String
      Parameters:
      registers - Register array received via Modbus
      offset - First Register containing the String to convert
      stringLength - number of characters in String (must be even)
      Returns:
      Converted String
